Html: After this first version is out of beta I would like to add a chart control. Any interest?
The proof of concept version that I have now is not but I would like to do a 3D version for the challenge.
sound interest , actually building a chart as windows control will be really useful.

There has already been some excellent work done on some (in my opinion) great 2-D chart controls over at ZedGrpah and NPlot
http://zedgraph.org/
http://netcontrols.org/nplot/

I consistenly use ZedGraph to visualize my scientific simulation results and love it.

What is lacking though is support for 3-D graphs. I'd suggest putting more emphasis on that if possible since 2-D charts already seem to be covered. It's a tough topic though and would take a lot of effort to do it right.

I have a 2D chart control as well that Iâ€™ve not published. The 3D version will be a very cool thing to write.

Thanks,
Scott
